title: The community in bronze to gold is bad
body:
For the whole time I have played league i have encountered many people, but honestly, 96% of the random people i have played with have just made me want to cave my skull in for how stupid these people are, While writing this i am afk in a game because I was provided no leash while playing amumu jg and then the top laner ignored me when i was getting killed, after that they complained and said I was a noob, trash, ect...... League at this level is not fun to play with random people.

I just have 1 little thing to ask of people at the end of this, do you think when/if the voice chat is added it should be push to talk and you have to hold down the key to talk or no?

most of the high dude ive played with either pop off something fierce, or are playing aram because they dont want to play ranked high.

The community in plat+ is also bad. 

Playing league at any level is like playing russian roulette, you don't know if you are going to get toxic teammates. Luckily, just like russian roulette you don't have to participate in this. You can choose your teams, make friends and have fun! If you are unsure of where to look, try out the [Oceanic discord](https://discord.gg/trEHP8t), [Summoners Society facebook](https://www.facebook.com/groups/SummonersSocietyOCE/?fref=ts), or post right here on the team recruitment board! 

Choosing who you play with has so many benefits there isn't really any reason why you wouldn't (especially for players like yourself who play mainly norms).
* You get slightly more IP for partying up
* Increased chance of keys
* You get chests when people in your party get an S grade
* You can use voicechat and have a bit of fun
* Get used to each others playstyles and maybe you can eventually take it to flex and gain your gold border and skin that way. 

As for the voice chat, no idea ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

People are so sensitive in low elo as well as pre lvl 30. I ask a question and you know what i get back in return? Firing bullets of anger straight off the bat even if the question was about whether u like this champ or not.
I'm fine with any champ unless it's a complete troll pick that will make it hard to win lane, I had a rammus support a few games before this shitty one and he was cool and fun to play with.

Look at OP...HOLY SHI-T, if you play **ammu jgle with E**, and cant clear wraith>wolf>Back heal>Blue then finish the route. Then you are pretty clueless. Learn to adapt. Not AFK, the worst kind of toxic, since you pretty much threw the whole team under the bus. 

The higher Elo has better gameplay, but still the same toxic shits. I've been in plat and near dia before, nothing change in attitude compare to silver. You might think challenger is best, but granted it only 200people; and out of those 200, 40-30 of them are probly toxic. 

It just seem bronze and silver has alot more, cause you guys have the most population.

Voice chat? mate Chinese players are so bad in this server, they tend not to talk in game, fkin abusing others in Chinese whole game and blaming those who speak in English lol, if voice chat included i can see whats going to happen, i would rather feed my game from now on than having these trolling chinese players in my team who fkin abusing all game and doing nothing, majority of them should delete of their account yes and it means 99% of these players, not only in gold elo but also Plat elo. i rather having a Vietnamese or Korean players than having fkin Chinese in my team, at least they can communicate and try to talk rather than abusing in their own language
